summary: Request to support WorkflowIdConflictPolicy for the Signal-With-Start API in PHP SDK. Follow-up to adding this support to StartWorkflow API.
userImpact: Users can now apply WorkflowIdConflictPolicy to Signal-With-Start operations for consistent conflict handling across different workflow creation methods.
proposedFix: Apply existing WorkflowOptions configuration (which already supports WorkflowIdConflictPolicy) to startWithSignal() method calls.
resolutionDetails: Confirmed that WorkflowOptions settings, including WorkflowIdConflictPolicy, already work the same for both start() and startWithSignal() methods.
keyQuote: The WorkflowOptions settings work the same for start() and startWithSignal().
